heisigStory: Recalling that books are made of paper, and paper made of trees, one might think of a book as a slice of a tree. Can you seethe "cross-cut" in the trunk of the tree? Picture it as a chainsaw cutting you out a few books with which to start your own private library.
koohiiStory1: The origin of a book is paper made out of TREEs. ONE tree can make many books.
koohiiStory2: An axe cutting a tree to make books.
